==== Notes ====

1. I installed Ubuntu Netbook 10.10 via an external USB CD/DVD-ROM and not USB. 

2. Installation is on a 64GB Solid State Hard Drive.

3. The HP Mini 5101 comes with a SD card reader built-in.  I have tested and confirm functionality with this on-board card reader. I will look into requesting that a Test Case be created for testing on-board/built-in card readers.

4.
